title: StockX | Senior Data Engineer
content:
Hi Leetcode Fam!

I switched to StockX a couple of months ago. Sharing the details here.


Education: M.Tech CSE in IIT
Years of Experience: 2 years
Prev Title : Senior Data Engineer
Prev CTC : 35 LPA (~ 26LPA base + Stocks)

Company: **StockX**
Title/Level: Senior Data Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Salary: **~ INR 56.7 LPA (base, including 10% variable)**
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: INR 21 LPA RSUS (Vested in 4 years)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): **~ INR 78 Lakhs**
Benefits : Standard Health Insurance for Team member and family

title: Greenlight | SDE 1 - iOS | Bangalore
content:
Education: BE in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 3 years 11 months
Prior Experience: RS labs, Swiggy, Fi money
Date of the Offer: 12th nov
Company: Greenlight financial tech (US Startup)
Title/Level: Software Dev. I
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 37.5L + 2.5L retirals (PF and gratuity) = 40L
Signing Bonus: N/A
Stock bonus: 30L for 4 years
Bonus: Performance bonus capped at 4L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 74L for 1st year - 44L later
Other details: Negotiated once, since i had another offer from phonepe.

Does anyone know about Greenlight? Seems like folks are all from reputed places, the interview process was good as well. 

[Phonepay offer](https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/4278619/phonepe-ios-developer-bangalore/2131947)
